alert.note: Alert for Livingston; Lyon; Marshall (Kentucky) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.senderName: NWS Paducah (Southern Illinois and Indiana, Southeastern Missouri and Western Kentucky)
info.headline: Special Weather Statement issued August 29 at 2:38PM EDT by NWS Paducah
info.description: ...A strong thunderstorm will impact portions of southeastern Livingston, north central Marshall and Lyon Counties through 215 PM CDT... At 138 PM CDT, Doppler radar was tracking a strong thunderstorm 7 miles east of Calvert City, moving east at 20 mph. HAZARD...Winds in excess of 40 mph and pea size hail. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...Gusty winds could knock down tree limbs and blow around unsecured objects. Minor damage to outdoor objects is possible. Locations impacted include... Eddyville. This includes the following highways... Interstate 24 in Kentucky between Mile Markers 29 and 49. Interstate 69 in Kentucky between Mile Markers 68 and 73. MAX HAIL SIZE...0.25 IN MAX WIND GUST...40 MPH
info.instruction: If outdoors, consider seeking shelter inside a building.
